job_title: Gas Systems Design and Operations Engineer
job_description:
• Minimum of 3–5 years of experience in gas systems engineering, with at least 2 years overseeing third-party design or managing design processes for specialty gas, bulk gas, or cryogenic systems.
• Collaborate with external design teams, contractors, vendors, and internal stakeholders to align gas system designs with facility needs and project schedules.
• Experience overseeing third-party designs for semiconductor, pharmaceutical, or data center facilities with stringent gas system requirements.
• Experience with control systems (e.
• Bachelor’s degree in chemical engineering, mechanical engineering, or a related field.
• Perform quality assurance and risk assessments to identify and resolve issues related to constructability, safety, and regulatory compliance.
• Ability to mentor internal teams or liaise effectively with external stakeholders to ensure design alignment.
• Familiarity with industry standards such as SEMI S2/S6, ASME BPE, and CGA guidelines for gas handling.

• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Chemical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Material Science, or related field.
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Excellent communication and organizational skills.
• Handle new process baseline qualifications.
